journals.notes: Hi I think this issue with Mac OS and loading mods has been fixed long time ago you have to wait for 2.73 release

RaFaL wrote:
> Hi I think this issue with Mac OS and loading mods has been fixed long time ago you have to wait for 2.73 release

Well, before I updated to 2.72 release, it worked fine. When adding the jaymod2.2.0.pk3 file to my jaymod folder, it crashes.
When I load the jaymod at begin screen, it loads without problem. Just joining a server does not work. It worked once, but after that it kept on crashing.

And when will the 2.73 version be released?

Issue known and already fixed in master.

> And when will the 2.73 version be released?
When it's ready.

Spyhawk wrote:
> Issue known and already fixed in master.
> 
> > And when will the 2.73 version be released?
> When it's ready.


Okay, really helpful... Is there a way to get the previous version? It somehow got removed (not in trash can).
Because "When it's ready" is not going to solve my problem... It could take months I guess?

PieJieDesma wrote:
> Okay, really helpful... Is there a way to get the previous version? It somehow got removed (not in trash can).
> Because "When it's ready" is not going to solve my problem... It could take months I guess?

No. The old version has its own set of problems, which are probably worst that the current 2.72.
Yes, it might be a couple of extra months. Asking continuously about the release date won't make it come faster (however, diving in the code and contributing actively to the project can).

You can install the windows version (bootcamp) if you can't wait, or buy a windows PC, or install Linux.

subject: Client crashes when connecting and loading server
description:
Hello,

I've downloaded the most recent version of ET:L (mac version) and tried to connect to a jaymod server. I placed all the files from my jaymod map from the previous ET:L version to the new one.

I connect to the server, it's starts loading and when the loading is done, it crashes without any errors, not even something in the crashlog.

Other players say I connect, when being welcomed into the server, I immediately disconnect.

This worked perfectly with the older version, but not with this one.

I use a macbook pro retina (from mid 2012) with Yosemite OSX.

Please help me, getting desperate.
